body:
Yes. We should allow buffers that require grad. There is no way to prevent
them from being requires_grad_ later.

On Wed, Oct 17, 2018 at 16:43 Adam Paszke <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I don't see why would we need to enforce this. We should probably simply
> start casting them using the same code as we use for parameters (without
> using .data or sth).
